data.text: Davide zeɠeni miná, é li, é zei En-Gedi, adaʋɛti náti maazɔlɔɔsu ɓaai.
Sayile ɠalegai ma ma, é zeɠe Filisiti nuiti polu, é mɛnini ga Davide ɠa En-Gedi yooi ma leʋebai zu.
É yeeloni nu waasaʋagɔ (3.000) ʋa, niiti ti ga salaʋusu ɠɛzɛɠɛzɛgiti Izilayɛle yooi ná pɛ su. Tɔ-o, naati-yo, ti li Davide ta ná-kɔɔɠɔ nuiti gaiziɛzu, eyɛsu ti zeeli Dɔɓɔ Woliiti Ta-Vasaiti ma.
É zeelini baala sasai ma, nii é ɠɛni pele ɠobaʋɛ, pugi ta ɠɛni miná. Sayile lɔɔni pugi naa zu, ga é lɔ dɔɓɔ zu. Davide ta ná-nuiti ti ɠɛni pugi naa ɓomaʋɛ.

Davide ná-kɔɔɠɔ nuiti ti ɠɛni ma: «Pɛtɛ yeeɠɛɠalai ɠa nii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ma minazeɠe boni, ga é è zili nui lɔ è yeezu, nii a kɛ nii nɛai è ʋɛ, è naa ɠɛ la.» Davide wuzeɠeni, é li, é Sayile ná-seɠei laaʋɛ ta leʋe ba, Sayile la looni ga naa.
Davide naa ɠɛai ma, zii doɠani, tɔɔzei é Sayile ná-seɠe wolai ta leʋeni ba.
É ɠɛ ná-kɔɔɠɔ nuiti ma: «Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI màkɛ, ga gè mina nii ɠɛɠala vai ta ɠɛ eyɛsu pɛ, gè ʋa yeeloo màliɠii ma, nii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI gulɔi ziaai ma, mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa é gulɔi ziaa ma.»
Davide ná-kɔɔɠɔ nuiti suzoni ga naama wooi, é la kɛɛni, naati ti ʋa vala Sayile ʋa. Sayile wuzeɠeni, é ɠula pugi zu, é ɗa li.
Naa ʋoluma, Davide wuzeɠeni, é ɠula pugi zu, é ʋilɛ Sayile ʋolu, é ɗa toli, é ɠɛ ma: «Ee, masagi! Màliɠii!» Sayile wɛlɛni ʋolu, Davide ʋilɛni ɲiibiɠa, é unpilɛ zooi ma, é nɔkɔ.
Davide ɠɛni Sayile ma: «Lee vaa zu è woilosu naati goo ma, niiti ti ɠɛɛzu è ma: ‹Davide ɠa pɔ é faa ɲɔu ɠɛ ga ɗe›?

Ɗa ɓɔɠɔi è naa ɠaa za ga è-ɠaazuɠɛzɛiti, ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠɛa za è lɔɔni zèezu, pugi zu. Ti ɠɛa ɠɛni mà, gè è ʋaa, kɛlɛ gè è yɛgɛ ná, gè ɠɛ ma: ‹Gè la yeeloozu màliɠii ma, mazɔlɔɔ toɠa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI yiimazeɠeai la, nii é gulɔi ziaai ma.›

Ee, kɛ̀ɛ, wɛlɛna ɗa-zeɠe wolai lakɔlɔgi ʋa, é zèa. Ni gè ɗa-zeɠe wolai lakɔlɔgi ta leʋea ba, kɛlɛ gè la è ʋaani, gaaɠa ga naa ga sili vaa la kìsu, ɓaa buzeɠe daalɔɠɔma vaa, gè la ɓalaa koto ɠɛɛni è laalɔɠɔma. Ɗɔun ka è gàiziɛzu ga è pàa.
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa é ɠɛɛzu ga tukpɔɠaaleʋe nui de yɔɠɔzu, ɗa-o, nà-o. Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa nɔ̀nɔi ʋotokula è ma, kɛlɛ nɔ̀un gè la yeevɔɔɠuzu è ʋa.
Eɠɛʋelei faalaalii wɔlɔmai bosu la ga: ‹Suɲɔu nuiti nɔ ɠa suɲɔi ɠa ɗa ɠula ti zu.› Kɛlɛ, nɔ̀un, zèei la ɠɛa è laalɔɠɔma.
Ɓɛ ɠa mu Izilayɛle masagi liizu daalɔɠɔma ga kɔɔi? Ɓɛ ɠa è ʋilɛsu polu? Gilɛ ʋoomai, koe fɔfɔ goi nɔ.
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa telebodai ɠɛ, tɔ ɠa é ɠɛɛzu ga tukpɔɠaaleʋe nui de yɔɠɔzu, ɗa-o, nà-o, toɠa màalobo, toɠa tukpɔi lo bɛ̀, é kùla è ya.»
Davide ɓegai ma ga naama ɓɔɛiti bo Sayile ma, Sayile gaazaɠani, é ɠɛ ma: «Dòun zunu Davide, ɗa ɓɔɠɔɓɔɠɔ ka gè è woomɛnisu nɛi ɓaa?» Sayile tɔɔzeini ga é ɗa wɔlɔ gola.
Naa ʋoluma, é ɠɛni Davide ma: «È lelebogɛ, é leʋe nɔ̀un ba, mazɔlɔɔ è nuɓɔɠɔlai ɠɛa bɛ̀, nɔ̀un gè faa ɲɔi ɠɛ ga ɗe.
È nuɓɔɠɔlai ɠula kɛlɛma za, nii è kɛɛzu bɛ̀, tɔɔzei Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠɛa fèeni è ya, kɛlɛ è la pàani.
Ni nui ta a ɠulana sili nui viliba, toɠa ɗa zɛ ná, é li ɓɔɠɔ yeema ɓaa? Nii è kɛa bɛ̀ za, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɓɔɠɔi naama ɠulanumai ve è ya.
Gè kwɛɛga niina ga, ɗa ɠɛɛzu ga masagi, Izilayɛle masadai ɠa zei ga pagɔ è yeezu.
Ɠonana bɛ̀, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI laaseigi zu, ga è la màvofodai ɠaaleʋea, naa ʋoluma, è la kɛ̀ɛ ʋɛlɛi laaseigi ɓalega.»
Davide ɠonani Sayile ʋɛ. Sayile ɠaleni ma ná-taazu, Davide ɓalaa ta ná-kɔɔɠɔ nuiti ti ɠale ma ti-lɔɔɠuzuʋɛ.
